original_title: Da Alegria, do Mar e de Outras Coisas
overview: Based on true events, it tells the story of Nem Glamour, a transvestite who performs night shows and witnessed the death of her best friend, Joy, also a transvestite, in a hate crime. For denouncing her tormentors, she is forced to flee the country - but not before saying goodbye.
title: Da Alegria, do Mar e de Outras Coisas
